implementation

Class NetworkImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementation.NetworkImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Net

    public class NetworkImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Net
    Implements the Net interface that provides useful methods to send messages through the network. Most of the times, simply redirect the request to the network provider because every thread-management is processed in provider.
    Author:
    Antoine

        public void sendToUser(java.io.Serializable payload,
                       java.net.InetAddress ipDest)
        Description copied from interface: Net
        Sends a message containing the string payload to the given ip. If the current user is not connected then it conects it.
        Specified by:
        sendToUser in interface Net
        Parameters:
        payload - content of the message
        ipDest - ip address of the receiver

      • requestDownload

        public void requestDownload(java.util.stream.Stream<java.net.InetAddress> sourcesIPs,
                            java.lang.String musicHash)
        Description copied from interface: Net
        Sends a request to download the distant file identified by the given hash from differents IPs (list of users who have the mp3). The list is used to manage errors
        Specified by:
        requestDownload in interface Net
        Parameters:
        sourcesIPs - ips where the music can be downloaded
        musicHash - hash of the music to download

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(java.io.Serializable payload,
                       java.util.Collection<java.net.InetAddress> knownIPs)
        Description copied from interface: Net
        Stop all interactions between user and network and notifies the network that the user has been disconnected.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface Net
        Parameters:
        payload - data to inform the network we are disconnected
        knownIPs - known ips in the network
